title: App version 2.9.9-oreo-beta (33)
message:
App version 2.9.9-oreo-beta (33)

Changes include:
* Compatibility with Android Oreo (8.0.0). Implemented new Notification Channel.
* Remember previous Notification service state between phone reboots.
* Add new Farsi transliterations.
* New (round) app icon.
* Fixed (potentially) issue with WhatsApp and LINE group summary notifications.
* Enabled "Dismiss Placeholder Notifcation" setting by default.

message: Trying to fix issues with Android O

message: Fix one-time crash after DB upgrade

title: New prod version 2.9.8 (31): Logging, day of week scheduling, bug fixes, improvements
message: New prod version 2.9.8 (31): Logging, day of week scheduling, bug fixes, improvements

title: FIX issue with All Day Schedule column! (Version 30)
message:
FIX issue with All Day Schedule column! (Version 30)

I forgot a comma. Therefore the db had a managled column name!
This answers everything! And I found out because I finally tried
a clean install!

title: Add exception handling when inserting to DB
message:
Add exception handling when inserting to DB

Now, we also handle exceptions when inserting to DB. Previously,
they were ignored. But that has caused issues of not seeing apps for
users. Provide useful guidance to users to submit logs when there are
errors. Also, change version number.

title: Fix DB upgrade issues
message:
Fix DB upgrade issues

Now use a more fool-proof way to upgrade DB:
1. Search for missing columns and add them.
2. Use exception handling when upgrading/downgrading db.
3. Look for any exception in db handling and for logcat extracting
4. Remove annoying toast in NLService.

title: Logcat logging and more debug logging for empty app list
message:
Logcat logging and more debug logging for empty app list

New in version 2.9.7-BETA (version 28)
Logcat logging is allowed and okay. Can only see self logs
which is what we need.

title: Add a lot more verbose debug logging for empty app list
message:
Add a lot more verbose debug logging for empty app list

This is to debug the empty app list bug some users experience.

3. Improve coding style in message extractor

2. Add new column in DB to store day of week schedule info
3. Add day of week schedule selection

title: Added per-app "discard ongoing notifications" option
message:
Added per-app "discard ongoing notifications" option

This allows ongoing notifications to be relayed for chosen apps -
allowing things like "now playing" notifications from Spotify.

This new option defaults to "on" so as to maintain the existing
"non-spammy" behaviour, so a user has to explicitly turn off the switch
to allow ongoing notifications to be relayed.

title: Improve transliterations for Polish and Lithuanian and bug fix
message:
Improve transliterations for Polish and Lithuanian and bug fix

Remove extraneous intent-filters in manifest that
caused some unintended consequences (such as app
being presented as a choice for "sharing" and as
a "dialer/phone" app.

Signed-off-by: Abhijit Kiran Valluri <me@abhijitvalluri.com>

message:
Fix TranslitUtil initialization.

TranslitUtil needs access to Resources which only becomes available

title: Add transliteration support for Unicode surrogate pairs (e.g. emojis).
message:
Add transliteration support for Unicode surrogate pairs (e.g. emojis).

Extend TranslitUtil to support Unicode surrogate pairs.
Add popular emojis transliterations to emoticon equivalents.

title: Improve transliterated text compatibility with Fitbit.
message:
Improve transliterated text compatibility with Fitbit.

 Some Latin symbols returned by ICU4J "Any-Latin" transliterator
 (e.g. for some Russian characters) are not supported by Fitbit.
 Use different replacements for such characters.

title: Extracted ICU4J code into a separate module.

Extracted ICU4J code into a separate module.

ICU4J code and resources were extracted into a separate 'icu4j' module.
They were also updated to the latest ICU4J release - 58.2.

A unit-test was added to the 'app' module to check that transliteration works as expected.

Exclude ICU4J code from lint checks. Do not abort the build on lint errors.

title: Just use the big text in case it has normal text as the prefix.
message:
Just use the big text in case it has normal text as the prefix.

This addresses the issue of artificial separator inserted after the prefix
(e.g. "small text" + "small text and some more" => "small text -- and some more")

title: Make notifications less visible.
message:
Make notifications less visible.

Use the minimal priority for the notifications.
Set visibility to SECRET to prevent notification from appearing on the lock screen.
Prevent notifications from showing up on other devices.

message:
NLService code refactoring

Avoid creating new Transliterator instances every time.

title: Version 16: Revert the filtering of notifications using some flags
message:
Version 16: Revert the filtering of notifications using some flags

This is causing major problems and blocking some useful notifications.
It looks like there is no clean way to block useless notifications
automatically! Strange, given that Fitbit's native implementation for
Blaze seems to take care of this already... may be they hardcoded it
for many typical apps?? Anyway, we should just give users a string
filter choice. So, implement that next may be.
